message.content: Yes, the authors included the total amount of compute and the type of resources used in the experiments. They mentioned that the models were trained using 8 cores V4 TPUs on the Google Cloud Platform, and training lasted approximately one day.
Yes, the authors mentioned the type of resources used for their experiments. They used 8 cores V4 TPUs on the Google Cloud Platform for training the neural harmonizer.
Yes, the authors mention that they trained models on the Google Cloud Platform using 8 cores V4 TPUs. They state that the training lasted approximately one day.
